title: Fed Signals December Rate Cut: Markets Rally 2% on Powell's Hints
shortdescription: Chair Jerome Powell's dovish comments spark buying frenzy across S&P 500.
description: FOMC minutes reveal 75% probability of 25bps cut – bonds yield drops, tech stocks lead surge as inflation cools to 2.1%.
author: Henrry Willy

title: UK Inflation Turns Negative for First Time Since 1960 – Deflation Fears Grip London
shortdescription: Energy price crash and weak demand push CPI to -0.3% — BoE in emergency meeting.
description: Post-Brexit trade disruptions and energy windfall cause first deflation in 65 years — pound drops 5% in one day.
author: Macro Anton

title: Jeff Bezos Sells $10 Billion Amazon Stock in One Week – Biggest Insider Sale Ever
shortdescription: Bezos cashes out ahead of expected capital gains tax hike under new administration.
description: Amazon founder executes pre-planned 10b5-1 sale of 50 million shares — proceeds to fund Blue Origin and real estate empire.
author: Wade Jenner
